item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, November 24, 2024 at 5:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. A Career Ending Mistake (64 points | 20 comments)
2. Those Correction Notices, in Full (5 points | discuss)
3. Full LLM training and evaluation toolkit (13 points | discuss)
4. Howstuffworks.com creator, Marshall Brain, has died (44 points | 6 comments)
5. Frosted Glass from Games to the Web: HTML glass UI inspired by AAA game dev (579 points | 126 comments)
6. History of Hangul (14 points | 6 comments)
7. Linux 6.13 Will Report the Number of Hung Tasks Since Boot (22 points | discuss)
8. Deegen: A JIT-Capable VM Generator for Dynamic Languages (47 points | 4 comments)
9. Senators Say TSA's Facial Recognition Program Is Out of Control (24 points | 2 comments)
10. Evidence of oldest known alphabetic writing unearthed in ancient Syrian city (308 points | 213 comments)
11. Bocker: Docker implemented in around 100 lines of Bash (2015) (318 points | 91 comments)
12. Which Power Plant Does My Electricity Come From? (133 points | 51 comments)
13. The Size of BYD's Factory (5 points | 1 comment)
14. Open source audio transcription model that obscures sensitive info in realtime (6 points | 1 comment)
15. Jiga (YC W21) Is Hiring Operations Coordinator ( | hide)
16. The 'giant' river crabs that live beneath Rome's ancient ruins (34 points | 5 comments)
17. A 132-Year-Old Message in a Bottle in a Scottish Lighthouse (60 points | 34 comments)
18. How to give a senior leader feedback without getting fired (314 points | 280 comments)
19. The English Esoteric Programming Language (21 points | 8 comments)
20. Php.net Is Down (36 points | 36 comments)
21. Highest-resolution images ever captured of the sun’s surface (476 points | 125 comments)
22. Tweaking non-neural brain cells can cause memories to fade (7 points | discuss)
23. This G15 is the Oldest Running Digital Computer in America [video] (21 points | 2 comments)
24. Undersea Cables Connect the Global Internet (32 points | 14 comments)
25. Antenna Diodes in the Pentium Processor (229 points | 34 comments)
26. Open-interpreter: A natural language interface for computers (10 points | 1 comment)
27. Three hundred words you can spell on a calculator [pdf] (79 points | 31 comments)
28. Robot Jailbreak: Researchers Trick Bots into Dangerous Tasks (48 points | 16 comments)
29. 32k context length text embedding models (81 points | 27 comments)
30. Continuous Integration Dashboard for Apache NuttX RTOS (Prometheus and Grafana) (68 points | 1 comment)
